companion.what_heading: Your Health Data, On Your Phone
companion.what_description: Access your medical records from your phone while keeping everything private and encrypted. No cloud, no third parties.
companion.trust_privacy: Your data stays on your devices
companion.get_app_description: Scan this QR code with your phone camera to open the install page.
companion.get_app_note: Both devices must be on the same WiFi network.
companion.heading: INSTALL COMPANION APP
companion.description_line1: Serve the Coheara companion app to your phone over WiFi.
companion.phone_install_note: Your phone will open a page to install the companion app.
companion.pair_description: Show a QR code for your companion app to scan and establish a secure connection.
companion.install_step_1: Scan the QR code with your phone camera
companion.install_step_2: Install or open the companion app
companion.install_step_3: Pair your phone from within the app
companion.unlock_description: Enter passwords so your companion app can access family profiles without touching the desktop.
